title: KubeCon 24: GUAC Reveals Where the Vulnerabilities Hide
author: Joab Jackson
description: Software Bills of Material (SBOMs) are only the first step in understanding security data. GUAC uses a dependency graph to more readily display problematic components.
cntitle: KubeCon 24：GUAC 揭示了漏洞隐藏的位置
cndescription: 软件物料清单 (SBOM) 只是了解安全数据的第一步。GUAC 使用依赖关系图更直观地显示有问题的组件。
